meanings.definition: An amount of money or units of something that is in the multimillions.
meanings.sent1: The company made multimillions from their latest product launch.
meanings.sent2: The lottery jackpot reached multimillions this week.
meanings.sent3: It's hard to imagine having multimillions in the bank!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of rare coins was worth multimillions.
meanings.sent5: The treasure hidden in the cave was rumored to be worth multimillions.

meanings.sent1: The population of the city was in the multimillions.
meanings.sent2: The star athlete had fans in the multimillions.
meanings.sent3: The number of stars in the galaxy is in the multimillions!
meanings.sent4: The possibilities are endless when you have multimillions to spend.
meanings.sent5: The forest was home to wildlife in the multimillions.
